meta.title: Ai easy - Simple PDF & Image Tools
meta.description: Manage, convert, compress your files and AI tools — all in one place.

hero.title: Simple PDF & Image Tools
hero.subtitle: Manage, convert, compress your files and AI tools — all in one place.

tools.title: All The Tools You Need
tools.subtitle: A comprehensive suite of tools to handle any PDF and image task, right in your browser.
tools.noResults: No tools found. Try searching for a different term.

list.title: Remove Pages
list.description: Delete specific pages from a PDF

list.title: Split PDF
list.description: Split a large PDF into multiple files

list.title: Extract Pages
list.description: Extract specific pages into a new PDF

list.title: Rotate PDF
list.description: Rotate pages to the left or right

list.title: Image to PDF
list.description: Combine multiple images into one PDF

list.title: PDF OCR
list.description: Extract searchable text from scanned PDFs

list.title: Crop PDF
list.description: Crop the margins of PDF pages

list.title: Extract Text
list.description: Extract all text from a PDF

list.title: Word Counter
list.description: Count the words and characters in a text or document.

list.title: Blur Image
list.description: Apply a blur effect to parts of an image

list.title: Translate PDF
list.description: Translate text in a PDF to other languages

list.title: QR Code Generator
list.description: Generate custom QR codes for URLs, text, and more.

helpPage.title: Help Center
helpPage.content: Need help? We're here for you. If you encounter any issues or have questions about our tools, please contact our support team via email. We strive to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.content: By using our service, you are agreeing to these terms. Please read them carefully. Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties. We assume no liability for any data loss or damage that may occur from using our tools. You are responsible for ensuring you have adequate backups of your files.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.content: Your privacy is important to us. We do not store your files on our servers. All processing is done directly in your browser. We do not collect any personal information from you. We may use essential cookies to enhance your experience on our site, but we do not track you across other websites.

jpgToPdfPage.title: Image to PDF
jpgToPdfPage.subtitle: Easily convert images to PDF files
jpgToPdfPage.merge: Merge all images into one PDF file

pngToPdfPage.title: Image to PDF
pngToPdfPage.subtitle: Easily convert images to PDF files
pngToPdfPage.merge: Merge all images into one PDF file

pdfToJpgPage.title: PDF to JPG
pdfToJpgPage.subtitle: Convert each PDF page into a JPG image

addPageNumbersPage.title: Add Page Numbers to PDF
addPageNumbersPage.subtitle: Easily add page numbers to your PDF files
addPageNumbersPage.formatHint: Use {n} for page number, and {p} for total pages

extractTextPage.title: Extract Text from PDF
extractTextPage.subtitle: Extract all text content from your PDF file.
extractTextPage.noTextOnPage: No extractable text on this page.
extractTextPage.noTextFoundDescription: No extractable text was found in this file.
extractTextPage.errorDescription: Failed to extract text from the PDF.

pdfOcrPage.title: PDF OCR
pdfOcrPage.subtitle: Extract text from scanned PDF files with precision.
pdfOcrPage.errorDescription: An error occurred while extracting text from this page.
pdfOcrPage.alertDescription: This tool uses AI and may take a moment to process each page. Accuracy can vary based on the original document's quality.

splitPdfPage.title: Split PDF
splitPdfPage.subtitle: Divide a PDF, extract specific pages.

extract.title: Extract
extract.description: Select the pages you want to extract into a new PDF. You can use Shift-Click to select a range.

range.title: Split by range
range.description: Define page ranges to create multiple PDFs. You can also click on pages to define ranges.
range.label: Define ranges

fixed.title: Fixed split
fixed.description: Split the PDF into multiple files, each with a fixed number of pages.

error.invalidFileDescription: Please select a valid PDF file.
error.loadErrorDescription: Could not load the PDF. Please ensure the file is valid.
error.aiError: An error occurred while contacting the AI service.
error.emptyPdf: Cannot create an empty PDF. Please check your ranges or selection.
error.splitFailedDescription: An unexpected error occurred while splitting the file.
error.noPagesDescription: Please select at least one page to extract.
error.invalidRange: Please enter at least one valid range.
error.invalidFixedNumber: Please enter a valid number greater than zero.

success.title: Success!
success.description: The PDF was split into {count} file(s).

extractPagesPage.title: Extract PDF Pages
extractPagesPage.subtitle: Select and extract specific pages into a new document.

extract.title: Extract
extract.description: Select the pages you want to extract into a new PDF. You can use Shift-Click to select a range.

error.invalidFileDescription: Please select a valid PDF file.
error.loadErrorDescription: Could not load the PDF. Please ensure the file is valid.
error.aiError: An error occurred while contacting the AI service.
error.emptyPdf: Cannot create an empty PDF. Please check your ranges or selection.
error.splitFailedDescription: An unexpected error occurred while extracting the pages.
error.noPagesDescription: Please select at least one page to extract.
error.invalidRange: Please enter at least one valid range.
error.invalidFixedNumber: Please enter a valid number greater than zero.

mergePdfPage.title: Merge PDF
mergePdfPage.subtitle: Combine multiple PDFs into a single, organized file.

organizePdfPage.title: Organize PDF
organizePdfPage.description: Reorder, delete, add, or rotate pages.

warning.title: Limited Arabic Support
warning.description: Arabic language support is currently limited. Text may not render correctly. Using English is recommended.

cropPdfPage.title: Crop PDF
cropPdfPage.subtitle: Easily crop the margins of your PDF pages.

errors.readError: Could not read the PDF file.
errors.noCropAreaDescription: Please select an area to crop first.

wordCounter.title: Word Counter
wordCounter.description: Count the words and characters in your text or document.
wordCounter.placeholder: Paste your text here or upload a file...

errors.unsupportedFile: Unsupported file type. Please upload a .txt or .pdf file.
errors.fileReadError: An error occurred while reading the file.
errors.pdfError: Failed to process the PDF file.

translatePdfPage.title: Translate PDF
translatePdfPage.description: Extract text from each page and translate it to other languages.

compressImagePage.title: Compress Images
compressImagePage.subtitle: Compress and convert images to reduce their file size.

protectPdfPage.title: Protect PDF
protectPdfPage.description: Secure your PDF with a password.

errors.alreadyProtectedDescription: This file is already password protected.

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your PDF has been successfully protected.

unlockPdfPage.title: Unlock PDF
unlockPdfPage.description: Remove the password from a PDF.

errors.wrongPassword: The password you entered is incorrect.

qrCodeGenerator.noQrCode: QR Code will appear here once you enter data.

errors.geolocationNotSupportedDescription: Your browser does not support the Geolocation API.
errors.geolocationErrorDescription: Could not get your location. Please ensure location permissions are enabled.
